member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimiter
member.summary: Defines the contract for a rate limiter that controls the rate of operations.
member.remarks: Implementations must be thread-safe. A single instance may be accessed concurrently from multiple threads.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimiter.AttemptAcquire(System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to acquire the specified number of permits synchronously without waiting.
member.param: The number of permits to acquire. Must be at least 1.
member.returns: A indicating whether the permits were granted.
member.exception: Thrown when the limiter has been disposed.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimiter.AcquireAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously acquires the specified number of permits, potentially waiting if necessary.
member.param: The number of permits to acquire. Must be at least 1.
A token to cancel the wait.
member.returns: A indicating whether the permits were granted.
member.exception: Thrown when the limiter has been disposed.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimiter.GetStatistics
member.summary: Returns a snapshot of the current rate limiter statistics.
member.returns: Current counters for this rate limiter instance.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimiterPolicy
member.summary: Defines a rate limiting policy that resolves partition keys and creates instances for each partition.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimiterPolicy.PartitionBy
member.summary: A delegate that extracts a partition key from the incoming HTTP request. Requests with the same partition key share a rate limiter instance.
member.remarks: If the delegate returns null, the request is assigned to a global partition.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimiterPolicy.CreateLimiter(System.TimeProvider)
member.summary: Creates a new instance for a partition. Called once per unique partition key; the result is cached by the store.
member.param: The time provider used by time-based algorithms.
member.returns: A new rate limiter configured according to this policy.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimitStore
member.summary: Manages instances keyed by policy name and partition key.
member.remarks: Implementations must be thread-safe for concurrent access from multiple requests.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimitStore.GetOrCreate(System.String,System.String,System.Func{JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimiter})
member.summary: Returns an existing rate limiter for the given key, or creates one using the factory.
member.param: The name of the rate limiting policy.
The partition key (e.g., client IP, API key).
A factory delegate invoked when no limiter exists for this key.
member.returns: The rate limiter associated with the composite key.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimitStore.TryRemove(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes and disposes the rate limiter for the given key if it exists.
member.param: The policy name.
The partition key.
member.returns: true if a limiter was found and removed; otherwise false.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimitStore.Clear
member.summary: Removes and disposes all stored rate limiter instances.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitLease
member.summary: Represents the result of attempting to acquire permits from a rate limiter.
member.remarks: Leases that carry a release callback (e.g., from a ) must be disposed to return the permits. Always use a using statement or block.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitLease.IsAcquired
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the requested permits were successfully acquired.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitLease.Limit
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of permits allowed by the policy (the configured limit).

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitLease.Remaining
member.summary: Gets the number of permits still available after this acquisition.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitLease.RetryAfter
member.summary: Gets the suggested time to wait before retrying, or null if not applicable. Populated when is false.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitLease.ResetAfter
member.summary: Gets the time until the current rate limit window resets, or null if not applicable.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitLease.Acquired(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Action)
member.summary: Creates a lease representing a successful acquisition.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitLease.Rejected(System.Int64,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Creates a lease representing a rejected acquisition.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitLease.Dispose
member.summary: Releases any held permits back to the rate limiter. Safe to call multiple times.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitStatistics
member.summary: A snapshot of counters for a rate limiter instance.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitStatistics.CurrentAvailablePermits
member.summary: Gets the number of permits currently available for acquisition.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitStatistics.TotalSuccessfulLeases
member.summary: Gets the total number of successful lease acquisitions since creation.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitStatistics.TotalFailedLeases
member.summary: Gets the total number of failed (rejected) lease acquisitions since creation.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Algorithms.ConcurrencyLimiter
member.summary: A rate limiter that caps the number of concurrent in-flight operations. Permits are returned when the is disposed.

remarks.para: Unlike time-window algorithms, this limiter does not track request rates. Instead, it ensures that no more than PermitLimit operations execute simultaneously. Callers must dispose the returned lease to release permits.
Thread-safe. All public members may be called concurrently.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.Algorithms.ConcurrencyLimiter.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new concurrency limiter.
member.param: Maximum number of concurrent permits. Must be at least 1.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Algorithms.FixedWindowRateLimiter
member.summary: A rate limiter that counts requests in fixed, non-overlapping time windows. When a window expires the counter resets to zero.

remarks.para: Simple and predictable, but can allow up to 2× the configured limit at window boundaries when requests cluster at the end of one window and the start of the next. Use if you need smoother enforcement.
Thread-safe. All public members may be called concurrently.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.Algorithms.FixedWindowRateLimiter.#ctor(System.Int32,System.TimeSpan,System.TimeProvider)
member.summary: Creates a new fixed window rate limiter.
member.param: Maximum number of permits allowed per window.
Duration of each fixed time window.
Optional time provider for testing. Defaults to .
member.exception: Thrown when is less than 1 or is not a positive duration.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Algorithms.SlidingWindowRateLimiter
member.summary: A rate limiter that counts requests over a rolling time window divided into segments. Older segments are discarded as time advances, providing smoother enforcement than .

remarks.para: The window is split into SegmentsPerWindow equal sub-intervals. The total request count across all active segments determines whether new requests are allowed. As time progresses, expired segments are zeroed out.
Thread-safe. All public members may be called concurrently.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.Algorithms.SlidingWindowRateLimiter.#ctor(System.Int32,System.TimeSpan,System.Int32,System.TimeProvider)
member.summary: Creates a new sliding window rate limiter.
member.param: Maximum number of permits allowed within the rolling window.
Total duration of the sliding window.
Number of sub-segments the window is divided into. Higher values give finer granularity at the cost of slightly more bookkeeping. Must be at least 2.
Optional time provider for testing. Defaults to .
member.exception: Thrown when is less than 1, is less than 2, or is not a positive duration.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Algorithms.TokenBucketRateLimiter
member.summary: A rate limiter that uses the token bucket algorithm, allowing controlled bursts while enforcing a sustained request rate.

remarks.para: Tokens are replenished continuously based on elapsed time. When a request arrives, the bucket is refilled proportionally to the time since the last access, then tokens are consumed. If insufficient tokens are available the request is rejected.
Thread-safe. All public members may be called concurrently.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.Algorithms.TokenBucketRateLimiter.#ctor(System.Int32,System.TimeSpan,System.Int32,System.TimeProvider)
member.summary: Creates a new token bucket rate limiter.
member.param: The number of permits replenished per .
The time period over which tokens are added.
The maximum number of tokens the bucket can hold (burst capacity).
Optional time provider for testing. Defaults to .
member.exception: Thrown when or is less than 1, or is not a positive duration.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingApplicationBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for adding rate limiting middleware to the ASP.NET Core pipeline.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseRateLimiting(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Adds rate limiting middleware to the request pipeline. Must be called after UseRouting so endpoint metadata (e.g., ) is available.
member.param: The application builder.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingServiceCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for registering rate limiting services with dependency injection.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingServiceCollectionExtensions.AddRateLimiting(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingOptions})
member.summary: Adds rate limiting services to the service collection.
member.param: The service collection.
A delegate to configure .

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Internal.RateLimitHeaders
member.summary: Standard header names for rate limiting responses.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Middleware.DisableRateLimitingAttribute
member.summary: Disables rate limiting for a controller or action, overriding any default policy.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Middleware.RateLimitAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the rate limiting policy to apply to a controller or action.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Middleware.RateLimitAttribute.PolicyName
member.summary: Gets the name of the rate limiting policy to apply. Must match a policy registered in .

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.Middleware.RateLimitAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new targeting the named policy.
member.param: The name of the registered rate limiting policy.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Middleware.RateLimitingMiddleware
member.summary: ASP.NET Core middleware that enforces rate limiting policies on incoming requests.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.Middleware.RateLimitingMiddleware.CreateFactory(JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimiterPolicy)
member.summary: Returns a factory delegate that captures the policy in a lightweight manner. The TimeProvider is accessed from the field to avoid a second capture.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.ConcurrencyPolicy
member.summary: Configures a concurrency limiting policy that caps simultaneous in-flight requests.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.ConcurrencyPolicy.PermitLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent permits. Must be at least 1.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.ConcurrencyPolicy.PartitionBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the function that extracts a partition key from the request. Defaults to the client's remote IP address.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.FixedWindowPolicy
member.summary: Configures a fixed window rate limiting policy.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.FixedWindowPolicy.PermitLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of permits allowed per window. Must be at least 1.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.FixedWindowPolicy.Window
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of each fixed time window.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.FixedWindowPolicy.PartitionBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the function that extracts a partition key from the request. Defaults to the client's remote IP address.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.SlidingWindowPolicy
member.summary: Configures a sliding window rate limiting policy.

example.code: new SlidingWindowPolicy { PermitLimit = 100, Window = TimeSpan.FromMinutes(1), SegmentsPerWindow = 6, PartitionBy = ctx => ctx.Connection.RemoteIpAddress?.ToString() }

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.SlidingWindowPolicy.PermitLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of permits allowed within the rolling window. Must be at least 1.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.SlidingWindowPolicy.Window
member.summary: Gets or sets the total duration of the sliding window.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.SlidingWindowPolicy.SegmentsPerWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of segments the window is divided into. Higher values give finer granularity. Must be at least 2. Defaults to 3.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.SlidingWindowPolicy.PartitionBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the function that extracts a partition key from the request. Defaults to the client's remote IP address.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.TokenBucketPolicy
member.summary: Configures a token bucket rate limiting policy.

example.code: new TokenBucketPolicy { PermitLimit = 100, Window = TimeSpan.FromMinutes(1), BurstLimit = 20, PartitionBy = ctx => ctx.Connection.RemoteIpAddress?.ToString() }

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.TokenBucketPolicy.PermitLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of permits replenished per . Must be at least 1.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.TokenBucketPolicy.Window
member.summary: Gets or sets the time period over which tokens are added.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.TokenBucketPolicy.BurstLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum token capacity (burst size). Requests beyond this are rejected even after a long idle period. Must be at least 1.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.Policies.TokenBucketPolicy.PartitionBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the function that extracts a partition key from the request. Defaults to the client's remote IP address.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingOptions
member.summary: Configuration for the rate limiting middleware. Holds registered policies and controls rejection behavior.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingOptions.DefaultPolicyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the default policy applied to endpoints without a . Endpoints decorated with are always excluded. If null, unattributed endpoints are not rate-limited.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingOptions.RejectionStatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP status code returned when a request is rejected. Defaults to 429 (Too Many Requests).

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingOptions.OnRejected
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional callback invoked when a request is rejected. Use this to customize the response body or headers. When set, the middleware will not write a status code automatically — the callback is responsible for setting the response.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingOptions.IdleTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets how long a rate limiter can sit idle before it is removed from the store. Defaults to 10 minutes.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingOptions.AddPolicy(System.String,JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimiterPolicy)
member.summary: Registers a rate limiting policy under the given name.
member.param: A unique name for the policy. Used in .
The policy configuration.
member.exception: Thrown when is empty or whitespace.

member.name: M:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingOptions.TryGetPolicy(System.String,JG.RateLimiter.IRateLimiterPolicy@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve a registered policy by name.

member.name: P:JG.RateLimiter.RateLimitingOptions.PolicyNames
member.summary: Returns all registered policy names. Used internally for diagnostics.

member.name: T:JG.RateLimiter.Storage.InMemoryRateLimitStore
member.summary: An in-memory store for instances keyed by policy and partition. Periodically removes idle entries to prevent unbounded memory growth.
member.remarks: Thread-safe. Suitable for single-instance deployments. For distributed scenarios, use a Redis-backed store.
